about_the_game:
The aim of the game is very simple. You must reach the end of the game by overcoming all the obstacles. You will need a light while playing the game because there will not be enough light on the map. For this you must use your own light.  Additionally, the game has many challenging obstacles. You must find the right solution to overcome all obstacles. However, this will not be as easy as you think.

The game's mechanics are very easy to learn: W-A-S-D / SpaceBar / Mouse / E: for lighting / Q: for running / G: quick kill.

The important thing is only finishing the game. The time of finishing the game is not very important because of the game's high level.

Important Note:  The Game was designed for only Pro Gamers.

  • It is hard.

  • It is not normal.

  • Don't worry. As game developers, we finished the game in two hours. So the game can be finished.

For this you must use your own light.  Additionally, the game has many challenging obstacles. You must find the right solution to overcome all obstacles. However, this will not be as easy as you think.

The game's mechanics are very easy to learn: W-A-S-D / SpaceBar / Mouse / E: for lighting / Q: for running / G: quick kill.

The important thing is only finishing the game. The time of finishing the game is not very important because of the game's high level.

name: Only for Gamers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported

short_description: The game was designed for only Pro gamers. There are many hard obstacles in the game. You have to find a correct solution to overcome all the obstacles. However, It will not be as easy as you imagine.
